stimulusHtml: Let f be the function with  f ( 0 ) = 1 π 2 MathType@MTEF@5@5@@413D@ ,  f ( 2 ) = 1 π 2 MathType@MTEF@5@5@@413F@ , and derivative given by  f ′ ( x ) = ( x + 1 ) cos ( π x ) MathType@MTEF@5@5@@4935@ . How many values of x in the open interval (0, 2) satisfy the conclusion of the Mean Value Theorem for the function f on the closed interval [0, 2] ?
